{"source":"{% extends \"Layout 3 Column\" %}\r\r{% block left_aside %}\r
\r {% include \"Side Navigation\" depth_offset: 1 %}\r
\r{% endblock %}\r\r{% block right_aside %}\r
\r {% include \"Weblink List Group\" weblink_set_name: \"Secondary Navigation\" showdescriptions: true %}\r {% include \"poll\" poll_placement_name: \"Sidebar\" %}\r {% include \"poll\" poll_placement_name: \"Sidebar2\" %}\r {% include \"ad\" ad_placement_name: \"Sidebar Bottom\" %}\r
\r{% endblock %}"}
powerpagecomponent.name: Page with Side Navigation and Sidebar (3 columns)
